mapper.insert: insert into tb_user_qq(u_q_nickname, u_q_gender, u_q_profile, u_q_create_time, u_q_login_time, u_q_openid) values(#{uQNickname}, #{uQGender}, #{uQProfile}, #{uQCreateTime}, #{uQLoginTime}, #{uQOpenid})
mapper.update: update tb_user_qq set u_q_login_time = u_login_time+1 where u_q_openid = #{uQOpenid}
mapper.select: select u_q_nickname as mNickname, u_q_gender as mGender, u_q_profile as mProfile,u_q_openid as mOpenid from tb_user_qq where u_q_openid = #{openid}
